00020      /********************************************************
00021       *                      time_ew.h                       *
00022       *                                                      *
00023       *  Include file for the earthworm multi-thread safe    *
00024       *  versions of time routines.                          *
00025       *  Note: #include <time.h>    must be placed before    *
00026       *        #include <time_ew.h> in each source file      *
00027       *  using the earthworm time functions.                 *
00028       ********************************************************/
00029 
00030 #ifndef TIME_EW_H
00031 #define TIME_EW_H
00032 
00033 #include <time.h>
00034 
00035 /* Function prototypes
00036  *********************/
00037 struct tm *gmtime_ew   ( const time_t *, struct tm * );
00038 time_t     timegm_ew   ( struct tm * );
00039 struct tm *localtime_ew( const time_t *, struct tm * );
00040 char      *ctime_ew    ( const time_t *,    char *, int );
00041 char      *asctime_ew  ( const struct tm *, char *, int );
00042 double     hrtime_ew   ( double * );
00043 char      *datestr23   ( double, char *, int );
00044 char *datestr23_local( double t, char *pbuf, int len );
00045 
00046 
00047 #define DATESTR23  23   /* length of string required by datestr23() */
